{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = CraneBoard Development Board |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.mistralsolutions.com/product-engineering-services/products/development-platforms/craneboard/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Mistral |model = Craneboard |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = rev B |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer, development board |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Texas Instruments;AM3517; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A8 |cpu1spd = 600 <!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;MT29F2G16AAD; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR2 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Micron;MT47H64M16HR-25E:H; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth1chip = SMSC;LAN8720A; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 08:00:28
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2009.11;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.32;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_poe_type = af |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, console port (DE-9),, (115200 8N1) |jtag = yes,, 14-pin header,, J3
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = DVI-D, SDHC, CAN Bus, Component Video, |addchip = USB 2.0 ULPI Transceiver;SMSC;USB3320;;1;,,, 3V RS232 Transceiver;TI;MB3232I;;1;,,, Flat-panel Display Digital Transmitter;TI;TFP410PAP;;1;,,, 100V 802.3af PoE-PD DC/DC Controller;TI;TPS23750;;1;,,, Integrated Power Management IC;TI;TPS65910A1;;1;,,, 1.5A Low Dropout Linear Regulator;TI;TPS78601;;1;,,, 2.2A Power Distribution Switch;TI;TPS2024;;1;,,, 2.2A Power Distribution Switch;TI;TPS2034;;1;,,, Adjustable LDO and 5 V switch with dual current limit;TI;TPS2141;;1;,,, Isolated 5-V CAN transceiver;TI;ISO1050;;1;,,, 0.5A Current-Limited, Power-Distribution Switch;TI;TPS2052;;1;,,, 24-bit Low-Voltage FET Bus Switch;TI;SN74CB3Q16211;;2;,,, 10-bit Low-Voltage FET Bus Switch;TI;SN74CB3Q3384A;;2;,,, |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = none |manuf = Mistral Solutions |manuf_model = MS_CB_B_0444 |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 12/2010 |estprice = 199 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = India
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The board can be powered by 3 different methods: *5V/2A power supply plugged into the connector *USB Female Micro-B *PoE (802.3af)
DVI-D output
{{See also|List of SBCs}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Texas Instruments]]'' AM3517 @600MHz Cortex A-8 SoC *RAM: 256MB DDR2 *Storage: 256MB NAND *GPU: PowerVR SGX
==Links of Interest== *[https://processors.wiki.ti.com/index.php/CraneBoard ''CraneBoard'' on '''TI Wiki'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2011/09/28/craneboard-low-cost-development-board-based-on-ti-am3517/ ''CraneBoard: Low Cost Development Board'' on '''CNXSOFT'''] *[https://linuxdevices.org/craneboard-opens-up-industrial-cortex-a8-soc-to-developers/ ''CraneBoard opens up industrial Cortex-A8 SoC'' on '''LinuxDevices''' ]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
